basic_info.summary:
I'm currently an elementary school teacher. I have taught first grade for
five years and third grade for two years. I am interested in using my 
education expertise to develop educational websites and apps for students 
and teachers. I also have a background in professional development. I have 
trained faculty and staff how to effectively utlize technology in the 
classroom. I am very familiar with Microsoft Office 365 and Workplace by
Facebook. I have also held many leadership roles. In addtion to being the
technology liaison at my school site, I am the gradebook manager for the 
school site and the grade level chair for my third grade team.

education.details:
Attended education courses in teaching methodologies for elementary
school. Focusing on classroom assessment, literacy instruction,
classroom culture and politics in education. I also took courses in
exceptional student education. I have conducted research papers on 
effective strategies in literacy education. Worked closely with 
professors to create effective lesson plans and assessments. 

  - Bullet point
  - Bullet point

education.university: The City College of New York
education.details:
Attended psychology courses for child development focusing on both early
childhood and school age children. I have conducted research papers that
focus on early child development. I have conducted research with my 
peers focusing on psychological issues that affects early child
development.

  - Bullet point
  - Bullet point

experiences.company: Miami Dade County Public Schools, Miami, Florida
experiences.details:
Elementary school teacher. Taught first grade for five years. Taught 
third grade for two years. Responsible for educating up to 30 students
using the Florida State curriculum and state standards. Responsible
creating effective lesson plans that target students needs. Served as 
grade level chair for two years where I was responsible for my first
grade team. I worked closely with administration to create school 
improvement plans. Served as the technology liaison. In this role I was 
responsible for keeping track of the most updated EdTech tools. Then I 
had to train my faculty in those EdTech tools. I was the recipient of
the 2018-2019 teacher of the year award.

  - Bullet point
  - Bullet point

experiences.company: CitiBank NA, New York, New York
experiences.details:
- Bullet point
- Bullet point
   Assist customers with everyday banking needs. Cross sell banking 
 products to clients. Responsible for loading and unloading ATM machines.
 Kept track of money inventory. Ordered money for the branch. Responsible
 for $22,000 in cash box. Work closely with personal bankers to 
 familiarize myself with banking products.

projects.intro: Hi, here you will find the projects I have created. Some of the projects  were created using HTML and CSS. Other projects were created Javascript  with bootstrap and react.

assignments.title: React Traffic Light
assignments.tagline: A responsive website designed to change the light on a trafic light.

assignments.title: Random Card Generator
assignments.tagline: A responsive website designed to randomly display a deck of cards.

assignments.title: Conditional Profile
assignments.tagline: A responsive website template designed to input profle information.

assignments.title: Excuse Generator
assignments.tagline: A responsive website designed to randomly create an excuse.

assignments.title: React Clock Counter
assignments.tagline: A responsive website constructed with a reactive counter.

assignments.title: Instagram Bootstrap
assignments.tagline: A responsive Bootstrap website template created to display a picture feed.

assignments.title: Postcard
assignments.tagline: A responsive website template designed to input information on a postcard.
